about_the_game:
Blue Bird's Song is an animated interactive fiction game, like a visual novel. This is a dark fairy tale inspired by Charles Perrault’s classic French tale Blue Beard. Discover Birdie’s story and help her take charge of her destiny.

Birdie, one of Jehann's daughters, falls in love with Jonas and dreams of living a wonderful life with him, like the romances in the books she's read.

Unfortunately, this love story doesn’t have a happy ending and turns into a nightmare between darkness and creatures of the night.
Play the three storylines to discover the full story of the characters and the universe.
The end is not always the end.

The game is written in gothic narrative poetry, let the language enchant your adventure.
